description.value: As a diviner, you master remote viewing and prescience, learning information that can transform investigations, research, and battle strategies. You understand that knowledge is power. You add one 1st-level divination spell (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}) to your spellbook. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Diviner's Sight]{Diviner's Sight} school spell.
